TopicTitle: inversed shroud not tied to ModuleJettison?

Articles.Content:
simple idea, works just like engine shrouds when bottom node has something attached, but inversed and not tied to ModuleJettison/Decoupler/AnchoredDecoupler. Part(s) of mesh visible when nothing is attached to referenced node, if something is, some specified mesh object (and children) is destroyed before launch.

possible?
